attributes.additional_details: The BBC have handled the Lineker issue appallingly resulting in their status being downgraded. Consequently the channels should no longer receive state funding via a subscription service; the licence fee is outdated to say the least!
attributes.background: Debate in Parliament the merits of the BBC licence fee with the aim of curtailing it

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634869
